casebody.data:
JAMES RIDDLE v. THOMAS BRADUN and WASHINGTON RICE. High Court of Errors and Appeals. Heard, June 10-12, 1829. Ridgely’s Notebook V, 554. * *210[January 7, 1830.]

A fragmentary account of earlier proceedings in this ease is found at Ridgely’s Notebook, V, 545-551.

No opinion found.Click here to view source material.
